column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Meat heaven!  Bavette's and Maude's are a tie for me (both better than Gilt)
column2: but they each have their own feel and menu specialties.  Like
column3: Maude's the menu at B3 is perfect for Chicago winters and the ambiance is correspondingly cozy while still maintaining an old-school classy vibe.  Bavette's is better for steak
